boardgame.description: World War II has left the world in upheaval, and many nations' futures are filled with uncertainty. The USA and the USSR are the only Superpowers who can lead the world toward a better future._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Cold War: CIA vs. KGB puts you in charge of a spy network during the post-war era. Your purpose: to _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;persuade_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; foreign governments to embrace the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot;proper_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_amp;quot; ideology, by any means necessary. Manipulate local factions of influence to get your coup d'etat up and running. Double-cross and eliminate your opponent's leaders. Gain prestige for your side by winning the Space Race, dominating the Olympic Games, or ensuring that one of your countrymen wins the Nobel Peace Prize._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;In this decades-long conflict, victory will go to the side with the resources, conviction, and commitment necessary to ensure that their world view shapes the future._T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;Online play_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt; Jeux sur un Plateau (turn-based)_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_lt;br/_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_gt;

Fantasy Flight Games (FFG CW01) World War II has left the world in upheaval, and many nations_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039; futures are filled with uncertainty. The USA and the USSR are the only Superpowers who can lead the world toward a better future. Cold War: CIA vs. KGB puts you in charge of a spy network during the post-war era. Your purpose: to _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;persuade_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; foreign governments to embrace the _T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot;proper_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_quot; ideology, by any means necessary. Manipulate local factions of influence to get your coup d_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;etat up and running. Double-cross and eliminate your opponent_T_E_M_P_T_A_G_#039;s leaders. Gain prestige for your side by winning the Space Race, dominating the Olympic Games, or ensuring that one of your countrymen wins the Nobel Peace Prize. In this decades-long conflict, victory will go to the side with the resources, conviction, and commitment necessary to ensure that their world view shapes the future.
Reserved for bigchief

Fantasy Flight Games (FFG CW02) Cold War: CIA vs KGB is a card game that places two players in control of the world’s greatest superpowers in an age of fear. In a covert clash of ideology, politics, guerilla warfare, and dirty tricks, each player must establish the dominance and superiority of his country’s worldview while bringing about his own vision of the future.
The revised edition features streamlined rules and more compact components, so pulling the strings of world politics has never been more convenient.
Cold War: CIA vs KGB includes: -59 cards -Three tokens -Two score markers -One rulebook
